name: Issuu
description: Issuu is the leading digital publishing platform delivering exceptional reading experiences of magazines, catalogs, and newspapers.

name: MagicBlog AI
description: Bringing the magic back to content writing. Leverage MagicBlog to write long-form, SEO optimized articles in just minutes. Then use the MagicComposer to optimize them as needed. Get your first 2,000 words free! Start writing now!

name: FlippingBook
description: FlippingBook changes the way you present your documents.

name: Maglr
description: Create, share and manage interactive web content with Maglr: a no-code design platform for marketers and designers.

name: Liberly
description: Liberly is a subscription-based platform where Content Creators, ranging from models and adult entertainers, offer exclusive access to their photos and videos for a fee. It provides a space for creators to connect directly with their fans and monetize.

name: Frontegg
description: Elegant user management, tailor-made for B2B SaaS.
